data.name: Drift Go
data.detailed_description:
Drift Go

Drift Go is Multiplayer and Singleplayer Drift Simulation and Driving Game.
You Can drive on Cities, Circuits,Tracks and More!
You Can Drive With Friends In Multiplayer or You Can Play Public Servers.
Get a Quality Driving Experience by Controlling Your Car or Drift Like Crazy!
Customize Your Car and Paints!
data.about_the_game:
Drift Go

data.short_description: Drift Go is Multiplayer and Singleplayer Drift Simulation and Driving Game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8,10,11 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Graphic Card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8,10,11 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Graphic Card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
